snippet: Jordan, the second-leading scorer for the 15th-ranked Red Storm, is dealing with “personal and family circumstances” in Philadelphia, Coach Steve Lavin said.
abstract: St John's guard Rysheed Jordan takes indefinite leave of absence to deal with family issues.
lead_paragraph: Jordan, the second-leading scorer for the 15th-ranked Red Storm, is dealing with “personal and family circumstances” in Philadelphia, Coach Steve Lavin said.

headline.main: Rysheed Jordan Taking Leave of Absence From St. John’s
